alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:26PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Fort Bend, southwestern Montgomery, southeastern Waller and northwestern Harris Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 123 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jersey Village. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Katy, Tomball, Jersey Village, Brookshire, The Woodlands, Greater Greenspoint, Aldine, northern Addicks Park Ten, Hockley, Waller, Pine Island, Pattison, Hooks Airport, Willowbrook, Cypress, Carverdale, Greater Inwood, Hidden Valley, Fairbanks / Northwest Crossing and northwestern Acres Home. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller
